title: GD, what is your internet "Spirit Animal"?
body:
post an image, then try to deduce what characteristics the above poster is implying with their "Spirit Animal" also, doesn't need to be an actual animal... it  can be a picture of anything tbh.

here is mine :^)

https://animalblawg.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/photography-elephant-wallpapers.jpg
